positive_examples: This is an example of deception operation.
The deception operation demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed deception operation in this context.
A typical case of deception operation would involve these features.
The concept of deception operation applies here.
An operation designed to mislead adversaries about intentions, capabilities, or activities through coordinated false information.
negative_examples: This is an example of c t intelligence operation, not deception operation.
This represents offensive information operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CTIntelligenceOperation, or other types of OffensiveInformationOperation

definition: A planned action to mislead adversaries about intentions, capabilities, or operations.
